errors.error_description: The example usage incorrectly runs `protol` before `protoc`. `protol` is a post-processing tool and must run after `protoc` has generated the Python files.
correction_candidates: Swap the execution order of the `protoc` and `protol` commands in the example.
The `protol` command should be run first to set up the environment for `protoc`.
Remove the `protoc` command, as `protol` can generate the files itself.
errors.golden_answer: Swap the execution order of the `protoc` and `protol` commands in the example.
